hero.title: Our services
hero.subtitle: For candidates
hero.lead: A package of services for successful employment and creating an impressive professional resume.

basic.title: Basic
features: Career consultation with the Head of Recruiting - 1 hour;
A checklist for packaging a professional personal brand on LinkedIn, Instagram, and others of your choice;
Interview preparation checklist;
Checklist for successfully passing the interview;
Formation of a complete psychological portrait and recommendations for personal professional growth;
Development of a designer resume in 2 languages (Ukrainian, English), with an additional option to change the languages to those important to you;
List of job search resources;

standard.title: Standard
features: Career consultation with the Head of Recruiting - 1 hour;
A checklist for packaging a professional personal brand on LinkedIn, Instagram, and others of your choice;
Interview preparation checklist;
Checklist for successfully passing the interview;
Development of a designer resume in 2 languages (Ukrainian, English); <1>additionally, there is an option to change languages to those that are important to you;</1>
Formation of a complete psychological portrait and recommendations for personal professional growth;
List of job search resources;

pro.title: Pro
features: Career consultation with a Business Psychologist - 1 hour;
A checklist for packaging a professional personal brand on LinkedIn, Instagram, and others of your choice;
Interview preparation checklist;
Checklist for successfully passing the interview;
Development of a designer resume in 2 languages (Ukrainian, English), with an additional option to change the languages to those important to you;
Formation of a complete psychological portrait and recommendations for personal professional growth;
List of job search resources;

teamContact.subtitle: Head of Recruiting & Human Resources Director

points: lack of understanding of how to properly present your strengths and professionalism
lack of resume structure and understanding of where to find your dream offer
understanding your own characteristics, strengths and advantages for employers
